pageContext.claim: “For those of you that study this, China was always gonna overtake us in 2019. They are big, and they're strong, and they're smart. They were gonna overtake us in 2019. That's been going on for 10 years. 2019. Well, in 2019, we were surpassing them at a level that nobody's ever seen before.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims that China would have been the biggest economy in the world if he had not been elected. Actually, China has been the biggest economy for many years when gross domestic product is measured by purchasing power parity, which measures living standards. China has been second when measured by nominal GDP, but projections of its GDP growth have only been somewhat weaker than projected.
